item.description: Configure Windows Server Core Domain Controller # Install vmware tools if not installed setup64.exe /s /v"/qn REBOOT=R" # Change the hostname and reboot Rename-Computer -NewName 'NewComputerName' Restart-Computer # Remove the old ip address Remove-NetIPAddress -InterfaceAlias 'Ethernet0' # Also you might have to remove the default gateway Remove-NetRoute -InterfaceAlias 'Ethernet0' -NextHop 10.0.0.2 # Now you can add the new IP Address New-NetIPAddress ` -InterfaceAlias 'Ethernet0' ` -IPAddress '10.0.77.104' ` -PrefixLength 24 ` -DefaultGateway '10.
